channel.title: IP address on Memo Tut

item.title: Disguise IP using tor on macOS and check with python
item.description: I was writing because I was thinking of scraping with python, If the same IP address is accessed for a certain period of time, the access will be denied for a while. When a site like this appears, it may not be possible to scrape well, so I will try to impersonate the IP address and scrape. However, since the operation is confirmed only for macOS, I think that the method is a little different especially for windows.
